subject: Football
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: The condition of Mr. Wenzel, a former N.F.L. lineman, has been discussed in the debate about the safety of football, which has resulted in policy and rule changes.
snippet: The condition of Mr. Wenzel, a former N.F.L. lineman, has been discussed in the debate about the safety of football, which has resulted in policy and rule changes.
